Subject: The Renegade Lord (Vykos --> Hydras)
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=140463140
X-Yahoo-Profile: warriorazure

Lord Vykos was happy. He had managed to destroy the diplomatic 
escort the Maximals Refugees had sent to the Predacons. Now, he 
would rule unhindered.

Vykos: Tell me, Warghoul, did we miss anyone?

The question was really: do I have to torture you once more?

Warghoul shuddered. He was deeply afraid of Lord Vykos, yet he hated 
him at the same time.

Warghoul: Barely, my Lord. I have picked up only one escape pod. 
Here is its flight path.

Lord Vykos studied the chart for a moment. He suspected the planet 
to bear a Transformer population because it went there at all. Pods 
never go where they cannot be picked up.

Vykos: You have done well this time. Power up the engines. We will 
pursue him. Scan the planet as soon as you are in range.

The small but well armed ship took some speed and got closer when...

Warghoul: My Lord! I have picked up Megatron's Energy signature!

Vykos: What?! Megatron?!? He is on that planet?

Warghoul: He seems to have fused with someone else, but I am 
positive on the results. He is there.

Lord Vykos thought for a moment then chuckled cruelly. He flicked a 
communication channel open.

Vykos: This is Lord Vykos of the Predacons. Megatron, or whoever you 
might be, contact me now.

He signaled Warghoul to cut the chase off and to wait.
